properties.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 19 at 5:01PM EST until January 20 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...Lake Effect Snow Expected...

.Lake effect snow is expected to continue near the lakeshore this
evening and the the flow will become more northwest tonight
causing multiple bands of snow to develop across the snowbelt.

* WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow
accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, bringing storm total snow
accumulations of 5 to 10 inches.

* WHERE...Lake and Geauga counties.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall will occur from 5 PM
tonight through 1 AM Monday.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST MONDAY
